1�If you wish to journey within Abyssea, bring me 5???? and I will grant you visitant status.
1�What would you like to do?Nothing.Learn about visitant status.Request visitant status.Extend visitant status.
1�All inter-dimensional travelers such as yourself must acquire visitant status in order to journey within Abyssea.To be granted this status, you must provide me with 5????.

1�Having come from a different plane of existence, your existential phase is unaligned to that of Abyssea.To overcome this problem, 6???? is required. It acts as a stabilizing agent that aligns and anchors your essence to Abyssea for prolonged periods of time.

1�Bereft of its effect, your essence will become unraveled within a matter of minutes, after which you will be expelled to your own reality.Do make a habit of first coming to me upon arrival in Abyssea.
1�A word of warning. As the presence of unaligned entities may have adverse effects on this dimension, only those with visitant status are permitted to venture beyond the searing ward.
1�Those without visitant status will be forcibly returned to the searing ward's vicinity.This is a preventative measure against the detrimental effects of inter-dimensional ??noise.??
1�When requesting visitant status, please indicate the number of 5???? you wish to process.A greater number will allow you a longer stay.
1�It is also possible to extend your visitant status by bringing me more 5????.
1�To obtain 5????, you must seek out Joachim. He is currently a resident of your world, Vana'diel.
1�Lastly, I will explain in detail the myriad effects granted by the visitant status.

1�Many are the reports of positive things occurring while under its auspices, from a general upturn in fortunes to more specific benefits such as accelerated growth and greater ease of cruor harvesting.
1�Naturally, these benefits will not come to the idle.The gains have been observed to grow proportionately to one's exploits in Abyssea.
1�All good things come to an end, however, and this is no exception.The effects endure as long as you remain in Abyssea, but will wear off at the instant of your departure.
1�That concludes my explanation of the visitant status.Remember always to obtain the status upon arrival in Abyssea.

1�Greetings, traveler. I am a resistance officer whose charge is the procurement of cruor.If you would be willing to part with any cruor you possess, I will issue you with helpful items in return.

1�What will you do? (Cruor balance: 
�)Nothing.Learn about cruor.Exchange for items.Exchange for temporary items.Exchange for key items.Exchange for enhancement effects.Dispose of abyssite.
1�Cruor is a naturally occurring mineral found as deposits on creatures native to Abyssea.
1�Known by some as ??blood gold,?? these red granules are highly prized and see use as both energy source and construction material.
1�It would be no exaggeration to say that cruor is the lifeblood of the resistance effort.As a matter of fact, the bulk of items I have in stock are cruor-based.
1�Chief among them being ??ancient abyssite,?? a highly concentrated, doubly valuable form of the stone boasting diverse benefits.
1�Ancient abyssite has been observed to improve the fortunes and vitality of their possessors, not unlike a good luck talisman.

1�The most popular varieties offer extended visitant status time, accelerated growth, and myriad enhancement effects.Some are even said to improve luck, but such benefits can be troublesome to measure.
1�I am limited in the types of ancient abyssite I can issue. The opportunity to acquire rarer varieties, however, will surely visit you during your time in Abyssea.
1�Besides the issuance of items, I am also authorized to imbue you with enhancement effects.

1�Trade for how many? (Cruor balance:

1�This ancient abyssite helps to stabilize your existential phase, allowing you to remain in Abyssea for longer durations.
1�This ancient abyssite resonates with the ground beneath you, allowing you to obtain more 5????.
1�This ancient abyssite facilitates energy release, making travel through Veridical Confluxes possible with fewer cruor.
1�This ancient abyssite mitigates mechanical wear, reducing the cool-off duration when using martellos.
1�This ancient abyssite resonates with treasure, increasing your likelihood of finding spoils after battle.
1�This ancient abyssite resonates with treasure, increasing your likelihood of encountering blue pyxides.
1�This ancient abyssite heightens your senses, allowing you to unlock treasure chests with greater ease.
1�This ancient abyssite imbues your soul with great strength, allowing you to infuse an additional atma for each piece possessed.
1�This is a map of Abyssea - La Theine. Don't leave home without it!
1�This is a map of Abyssea - Konschtat. Don't leave home without it!

1�Well met, wayfarer. I am an Atma Infusionist, and from my title I trust you can glean my field of expertise.Those who possess 6???? may come to me to have atma infused.
1�How might I serve you?You may not.Tell me about atma.Infuse me with atma.Examine infused atma.Purge atma.Reinfuse previous atma set.Select from recent history.

1�Atma is most accurately described as the crystalline agglomeration of an Abyssean creature's soul.Through painstaking research, we infusionists have discovered a way to imbue ordinary people such as yourself with its power.
1�Infusion makes possible the augmentation of individuals, granting them powers particular to the creature from which the atma is sourced.
1�The infusion process requires three objects: an atma, 6????, and cruor.
1�?6???? is a rare variety of ancient abyssite that can only be procured with great difficulty.And it won't please you to know that atma is rarer still.
1�For only the most savage creatures, you see, are known to yield atma.And if you thought that weren't trial enough, only by employing special combat strategies will atma be yours to own.
1�Atma-yielding monsters are known to have vulnerabilities that, if exploited, may result in a swift end to the confrontation.
1�Strike at a foe's weakness, and it will drop different spoils, often more valuable than usual. Among them you may find atma.
1�The vulnerabilities can broadly be divided into three categories: magic attacks, physical-based weapon skills, and magic-based weapon skills.
1�For instance, there are monsters known to be weak against magic-based weapon skills.Inflicting such damage upon them will impair their movement, and you may consequently be rewarded with atma.

1�All living creatures, however, possess the capacity to adapt, and vulnerabilities have been observed to change.Be wary if you wish not to discover to your sorrow that a once-foolproof strategy no longer applies.
1�Besting such fell creatures is in itself a harrowing task, and becomes even more so if procuring atma is your objective.
1�But should fortune smile upon you and you find yourself in possession of atma, bring it here.I will see that it serves you well.

1�Greetings. I am an atma fabricant--or, to the layman, one who fabricates atma.I can synthesize atma from the memories of adventure stored deep within your body and soul.If you have need of my services, you need only speak the word.
1�Ask for something?No thanks.Synthetic atma?My memories?Show me the atma.
1�As you are no doubt aware, the substance we call atma is a crystalline agglomeration of soul energy that can be harvested from the bodies of fallen Abyssean fiends.
1�The abundant power that it imbues when infused into our bodies is not in question.The perilous means by which it must be acquired, however, leaves something to be desired.

1�After all, bolstering the strength of one man means little if ten others must lose their lives in the process.Thus was the impetus behind our research: to discover a means for extracting atma from resources at our immediate disposal.
1�We experimented with nearly every substance in sight--be it animal, vegetable, or mineral.Yet each time, the atma produced was small, fragile, and entirely absent of the power we sought.

1�Then, one day, we hit upon the obvious answer that we had so long overlooked...ourselves.Yes, the atma extracted from our own bodies--particularly those richly possessed of experiences and memories--these housed a power rivalling that harvested from the most vicious of fiends.
1�If you possess such memories, then I can bring forth the latent power that resides within you as well.
1�Fear not, for there is everything to gain and nothing to lose.Save for some cruor, that is...
1�Curious, is it not?That potent physical energy can be extracted from such a tenuous, intangible thing...
1�But the strength our memories and experiences give us is real, if all too easily overlooked.Once isolated, it is simply a matter of recalling it, solidifying it, and bringing it to the fore.
1�Surely you understand of what it is I speak, yes?Your greatest accomplishments--those that make others stand in wonderment and admiration when you they hear your name.
1�We summon forth the energies from the deepest recesses of your psyche, and infuse it into the cruor you carry.The resultant agglomeration of organic mineral and soul energy is synthetic atma.

1�Mind you, the deeper and more puissant your energies, the more cruor will be necessary to contain it all.If you wish to have me assay the powers that lie dormant within you, simply speak the word.
1�Very well. We shall see what latent powers you possess.Stand still and clear your mind...
1�Yes...it is as I thought...Long and far have you traveled...many a battle have you fought...

1�Yes, I see within you 
� ?�[memory/memories] that I could process into atma.Which shall I extract?

1�Expend 
� cruor?Yes.No.
1�Very well.Let us begin the extraction.
1�Still your heart, and empty your mind...
1�The power is strong within you...6Slowly, but surely, it stirs to the fore...6Yes...6 Yes, it is come!
1�Behold, the physical manifestation of the innermost power of your soul!
1�You do not have enough cruor.
1�...And yet, I see nothing tangible enough for me to process.I am sorry.

1�I'm a Resistance officer charged with overseeing the Dominion effort, and we're looking for a few good ?[men/women].Since I don't see any around, it looks like you'll have to do.
1�Ask about something?Not now.General information.State of the Resistance.State of the enemy.Exchange Dominion Notes.Exchange battle trophies.
1�Ask about something?Not now.The Dominion effort...?How do I do my part?What's in it for me?
1�Wake up, soldier! I don't know if you're blind or stupid, but if you haven't noticed, there's a war going on around you.

1�The Resistance is locked in a bitter struggle to take back our rightful land from the hordes, and secure a future for our kind.We call this the Dominion effort. Has an inspiring ring to it, doesn't it, soldier?

1�And if you haven't noticed, we don't exactly have a surplus of personnel.Hell, I just got a field promotion from sergeant to tactician when my predecessor got his head lopped clean off by a fiend.Now they've got some sissy boy doing my old job, but do you hear me complainin'?
1�Anyhow, if you've got half a bloody stump of a leg to stand on and an arm to carry a blade, consider yourself recruited.Now listen up, soldier, because I'm only going to say this once.
1�I'll put this in terms even a dullard like you can understand.The enemy we face consists of two types of fiends: nasty ones, and even nastier ones.
1�We've got legions of ugly monsters prowling the land in throngs.We cut them down, and lure their even nastier buddies out of hiding.
1�These fiends are the beating heart of our enemy. Bring them down, and our battle is as good as won.Get it? Good. Now hop to it, soldier!
1�Hah! Ya may be short on wits, but you've got pluck.There may be hope for you yet, soldier.

1�If you're ready to make yourself useful, then you'll want to seek out one of our outposts.There's three in the area, so even a rookie like yourself should be able to stumble upon one of 'em by dumb luck.
1�Talk with a sergeant there, and sign up for one of our operations--Dominion Ops, we call 'em for short.Each op will involve exterminating a prescribed quota of a particular variety of fiend.

1�If you're halfway competent at your job, the Resistance will gradually expand its sphere of influence over the hordes.Our ultimate goal is complete domination against all manner of fiends. That's one hundred percent, soldier!
1�??What if I just kill fiends without signing up for ops,?? you say?Don't give me any of that lip, soldier!

1�Listen. Every fiend you bring down will aid the cause.But we can't be certain that we've achieved complete domination unless you sign up for ops, and report your success to the sergeant.You'll also be rewarded for your efforts. Bet that got your interest quick, didn't it?
1�There's more, soldier. This may sound bloody obvious--well, maybe not to a lackwit like you--but success in your efforts will raise the spirits of our entire company.

1�With the resulting boost in morale, our troops will fight with even greater fervor, affording us all manner of advantages in battle.??What kind of advantages??? Hah! That's for us to know and you to find out, soldier!
1�Expand our sphere of influence over the peons, and we'll start to lure the big boys out of the woodwork.
1�Take them out, and the biggest, baddest foes will start to show up.Where does it all end, you say? It doesn't! This is war, soldier, not a Lightsday afternoon walk in the park!
1�Now, where was I? The enemy leaders pack a punch, but they rely on their flunkies as the foundation for their strength.
1�Cut their subordinates out from underneath them, and they won't have a leg--or gnarled, twisted appendage--to stand upon.That's smart fighting. And in war, you fight smart or you die, soldier!
1�I couldn't tell you how many of these buggers we're up against, but I do know this.Each one we kill brings us closer to our goal of utter domination.
1�To keep morale high, we can't let up the attack on the enemy leaders.You got all that, soldier?
1�What's in it for you?You've got some nerve, soldier!
1�You're here to follow orders, not question them!When I say ??jump,?? you say ??how many malms high, sir!???Are we understood, soldier!?
1�But yeah, there's somethin' in it for you, if that's the only thing that's going to get you fighting for our cause instead of sitting around on your lazy backside.
1�When you report back after completing an operation or successfully bring down a notorious foe, you'll be awarded remuneration in the form of something we call Dominion Notes.

1�These notes can be exchanged for supplies to serve you on the field of battle: equipment, medicine, and more.And we're not talking your run-of-the-mill items here. This is some impressive stuff. I daresay it's worth more than your life, soldier.

1�Bet that put a spark in your eyes, didn't it?What's more, bring back battle trophies--the severed heads and gore-stained limbs of the fiends you slay--and we will reward your accomplishments with guerdon.
1�There are five echelons of trophies in total.Slaying more powerful fiends will yield more prestigious trophies, which in turn will earn you more valuable guerdon.

1�Battle trophies can even be exchanged for each other.Multiple lower-echelon trophies can be upgraded to a single trophy of a higher echelon, or vice versa.If you've got half a brain inside that skull of yours, you'll take advantage of this to obtain the guerdon you desire.
